changelog.change_log:
v.1.1.0.1
Fixed crash issues
Fixed an issue where players were boarding the plane abnormally
Fixed the issue where bombing areas and sound cues were not displayed
Further optimized server performance
Attempted to fix abnormal vehicle behavior, floating magazines, and character display issues
Fixed the issue where the respawn settlement screen was not displaying correctly
Attempted to fix the issue where throwing knives could potentially hit the player themselves

v.1.1.0.0
New Mode: Reborn
Added three new vehicles.
Redesigned the respawn mechanism (the pit).
Added anti-dizziness settings options for two vehicle types, selectable in settings.
Can display the map by placing mica inside the vehicle.
Optimized the experience of using items and weapons inside vehicles.
2v2 matches will be enabled if the respawn queue is too long.
New Player Guide Optimization
The new player guide now supports trying and selecting important settings.
Optimized the UI following method in the new player guide.
HQ has expanded with a new racing area.
Improved the display effects of the weapon table interface.
Added the new items from this update in the HQ.
Added a Battle Pass area in the HQ.
Improved the display effects of the HQ shop.
Added summer-themed gun skins to the HQ shop.
Created ARK company atmosphere in the HQ.
Optimized the display effects of the mode selection interface.
Added additional NA servers.
New locations: New City, Outpost, Airport, Two Excavation Sites.
Added a Ark Pit scene.
Replaced the plane crash wreckage area with a wild field.
Added a gate model to the resort.
Enhanced connectivity near New City, Outpost, and Airport points.
Hardened river channel at the canyon estuary.
Removed fences across the entire map.
Fixed road bumps and fractures throughout the map.
Smoothed uneven terrain throughout the map.
Added traffic signs along some roads.
Reduced the height of parachute towers.
Reduced the number of parachute towers.
Vehicle positions will be marked on the map when close enough.
Matches will randomly occur in daylight or dusk.
Matches will randomly feature dense fog.
Matches will randomly feature rain.
Final preparation before boarding will indicate possible weather conditions for the match.
Added in-game cargo missions offering advanced equipment.
Added in-game bounty missions offering substantial cash.
Added compass system.
The compass system supports displaying mission objectives and teammate markers.
Compass can be toggled on or off in settings.
Added LMG category PKP machine gun.
Added MP5A3 submachine gun.
Added AKS74U rifle.
Added throwing knives.
Added compound bow.
Added tactical item R.C Bomb.
Added tactical item Lifting Drone.
DBP12 bug fixes: Fixed non-highlight issues and lag causing inability to shoot, etc.
Attribute adjustments:
Base damage: 117 → 198
Spread angle: 2.6 → 2.2
Damage fall-off: 38M → 65M
Fixed the vertical grip penetration issue.
Shortened FuryV reload sequence.
Optimized content and display effects of the settlement interface.
No longer displayed on the map.
Significantly increased drop quantity (more in reborn mode).
Reduced the quantity and quality of items from individual chests.
Ground items:
Reduced cash drops.
Reduced drop rates of guns like RC416, AKalpha, etc.
Reduced attachment drops.
Increased drops of capacity expansion items.
Added mission chips: bounty mission chip, data upload mission chip.
Removed resurrection shop.
Removed advanced insurance; basic insurance moved to purple shop.
Revive teammates moved to purple shop.
Increased prices for some items: guns, attachments, capacity expansion items, med needles.
Reduced stock for some items: attachments, mag expansion items, guns.
Some tactical items are no longer sold.
The zipline now supports bidirectional travel.
Fixed the UI residue caused by using items.
Fixed character stuttering and arm movement issues during parachuting.
Fixed the bug causing difficulties in picking up items near vaulting objects.

v.1.0.5.0 Patch Notes
Added DBP-12 Shotgun.
Fixed a map glitch located at the Black Market.

v.1.0.4.0 Patch Notes
Added new Investigation Report event.
Added new exclusive pendant and Fan Art winning player cards.
Vaulting has been optimized, looting the lootbox near the vaulting point will no longer cause unintentional vaulting.

v.1.0.3.0 Patch Notes
Added new Investigation Contract event.
Contracts will now automatically track and progress and not needed to be manually activated.
Optimized the slot UI, now your slots will only display the items you have looted.
Fixed the error in indicating the storm circle, and now the game will begin with round 1 instead of round 2.
The safe zone of the Round 2 will now be indicated when the plane is outside of the map.
Suppressor
Bullet Speed +10% → +3%
Range +20% → +10%
Added new stocks of various sprays and pendants in the store.

v.1.0.2.1
Updated the notification message displayed when the game build is not up-to-date.

v.1.0.2.0 Patch Notes
Added new Bootcamp Mode, open for Lv1 - Lv15 (Rank Iron)
Enhanced anti-cheat
Decreased the pre-match rumble time
Partially fixed the mic disconnection.
Fixed wrong covers and thumbnails in blueprints.
Fixed badge pop-up notification errors.
[Quest Only] Slightly optimized the performance
S686
  Pellets per shot: 9 → 8
  Damage: 198 → 176
  Headshot damage: 277.2 → 193.6
  Increased the recoil by 30%
Flame12
  Damage:  91 → 66
  Headshot damage: 127.4 → 72.6
  Increased the recoil by 100%
[Solo Mode]
  Decreased the bot numbers.
  Now bots no longer drop ammos.
  Slightly tuned the storm circle range and game pace.

v.1.0.1.0 Patch Notes
Added new limited-time Solo Mode Beta.
Fixed multiple bugs hindering players from getting the badges.
Improved the dispersion of smoke of smoke grenades.
Addressed an issue that may have been causing errors in the knock stats.
Increased the S686 shotgun's pellet spread by 20%
Decreased the S686 shotgun's range from 28m to 23m
Increased the Flame 12 shotgun's pellet spread by 17%
Decreased the Flame 12 shotgun's range from 23m to 20m
Miscellaneous bug fixes.

v.1.0.0.3 Patch Notes
Added News &Announcements section to the main menu.
Magazines can now be pulled directly without pressing button A.

v.1.0.0.2 Patch Notes
Optimized the leveling system display, your rank will be upgraded every 50 levels by looping.
Fixed the incorrect display of "0 C dollar" when upgrading.

v.1.0.0.1
Fixed string display for store items.

v.1.0.0.1
Optimized
Overhauled the notification when the squad finished the game.
Now you can see teammates' details and player cards before hopping on the plane.
(Quest only) Added multiple localization options.
Fixed
The "Recently Played" tab now shows players' UID correctly.
Fixed the disconnection issue due to the desynced timezone, now you should no longer encounter any disconnection issue from the time settings.
Potentially fixed the stats of badge and Top 5 from careers.
Fixed multiple spelling mistakes.
Fixed a bug that players can carry attachments and skins from the beta test, and caused red dot notification errors on the weapon working bench.
(Quest only) Fixed an issue where the pivot settings would be reset to "wrist" each time the game started.
(Quest only) Addressed a bug that would dismiss the squad randomly.
